page.title: 01THE PARISH OF CANFORD MAGNA
page.content: The area studied includes all of {OAKLEY,MERLEY,& CANFORD MAGNA,NORTH {CANFORD HEATH},the eastern edge of {ASHINGTON}& the N.E. corner of {BROADSTONE.}It is a dormitory for Wimborne 1km to the N Poole 3km to the S. & Bournemouth 2km E. It is part of Poole Borough, has a Wimborne postal address & Broadstone telephone nos. There is no manufacturing industry, The only industries are gravel and sand extraction, and the complementary dumping of domestic and industrial waste from the surrounding area, and farming. There are many recreational facilities,Golf, Cricket, Riding, Walking Camping.The population is dependant for facilities on nearby towns. The area is mainly rural,with good mixed farmland but 1/3 is covered by post 1960 housing. The remaining land is under pressure for development
